text: A school girl, P. Solaiammal (17) of Zakir Hussain Nagar, was killed in an accident on North Beach road here on Wednesday. The girl was returning home, after writing Plus Two public examination, with her brother P.Murugan (21) and sister P. Mariammal (16) in a motorcycle. A lorry hit their motorcycle from behind and the two girls were thrown off the vehicle. While Solaiammal succumbed to injuries, Mariammal suffered injury on her right hand.
title: Girl killed in accident
